seed_resources_center_index.title: NewGen Studio Advanced Capabilities - Phase 2 MVP Seed Resources
seed_resources_center_index.description: Complete set of YAML/JSON templates and synthetic datasets for instrument integrations, image analytics, proteomics, and regulatory compliance
regulatory_frameworks: FDA 21 CFR Part 11 (Electronic Records, Electronic Signatures)

integration_and_instruments.title: Cell Sorter Integration
integration_and_instruments.description: Secure telemetry ingestion and operator workflows for BD FACSAria, Sony SH800S, Miltenyi MACSiMACS
integration_and_instruments.scope: Adapter configuration, OPC-UA/REST gateway setup, e-signature on sort jobs, export control policy enforcement

image_and_visual_analytics.title: Viable Counts Image Pipeline
image_and_visual_analytics.description: Colony detection, segmentation, and CFU estimation from plate images with uncertainty quantification
image_and_visual_analytics.scope: U-Net segmentation, morphological feature extraction, Poisson-based uncertainty, replicate QC

image_and_visual_analytics.title: Gram Stain Classifier
image_and_visual_analytics.description: CNN-based classification of Gram-positive vs Gram-negative with morphological insights
image_and_visual_analytics.scope: EfficientNet/ResNet classifier, saliency maps, per-tile and slide-level aggregation, control validation

image_and_visual_analytics.title: Cell Lysis Detection
image_and_visual_analytics.description: Computational detection of cell lysis via imaging (membrane integrity stains) and flow cytometry
image_and_visual_analytics.scope: PI/7-AAD fluorescence segmentation, flow singlet gating, PI threshold classification, multi-method integration

protein_and_structural_analytics.title: Total Protein MS Pipeline
protein_and_structural_analytics.description: MaxQuant/DIA-NN integration for label-free protein quantification and QC
protein_and_structural_analytics.scope: mzML ingestion, peptide identification, label-free intensity quantification, protein inference, quality metrics
features: Per-protein QC (peptide count, CV, mass match)

protein_and_structural_analytics.title: AlphaFold Protein Feature Extraction
protein_and_structural_analytics.description: Structure prediction and feature extraction for assay design and QC model integration
protein_and_structural_analytics.scope: AlphaFold2/OpenFold prediction, ASA/DSSP/pocket extraction, knowledge graph integration, assay suggestions

regulatory_and_compliance.title: OD → Biomass Model
regulatory_and_compliance.description: OD600 telemetry ingestion, calibration, and surrogate biomass estimation with anomaly detection
regulatory_and_compliance.scope: Time-series ingestion, statistical & surrogate models, growth phase classification, drift detection

regulatory_and_compliance.title: Batch Production Record (BPR) Template
regulatory_and_compliance.description: FDA 21 CFR Part 11 compliant BPR manifest with e-signature, audit trails, and compliance scaffolding
regulatory_and_compliance.scope: Batch header, unit operations, in-process testing, final product QC, release decision, deviations, export
features: Raw materials tracking and COA verification

image_analytics.title: Synthetic Plate Images (500 samples)
image_analytics.description: Procedurally generated and annotated colony images for viable counts pipeline validation
image_analytics.usage: Model training, CI segmentation tests, uncertainty validation

image_analytics.title: Synthetic Gram Stain Slides (200 images)
image_analytics.description: Synthetic and de-identified Gram-stain slides for CNN classifier qualification
image_analytics.usage: CNN model training & validation, control slide benchmarking

proteomics_and_biochemistry.title: Synthetic Proteomics Samples (20 samples + miniature mzML)
proteomics_and_biochemistry.description: E. coli, yeast lysates and spiked standards with minimal mzML for CI pipeline tests
proteomics_and_biochemistry.usage: MS database search tests, quantification validation, QC metric verification

biophysical_and_timeseries.title: Synthetic OD Timeseries (50 experiments)
biophysical_and_timeseries.description: OD600 + DCW calibration curves for multiple strains and media
biophysical_and_timeseries.usage: Model calibration, growth curve fitting, anomaly detection CI tests

how_to_use_templates: 1. Review template YAML for your use case (e.g., cell sorter integration)
2. Customize metadata, parameters, and thresholds for your lab environment
3. Create IQ/OQ/PQ runbooks using provided scaffolding
4. Reference acceptance criteria in your validation plans
5. Use CI smoke tests as starting points for your regression suite
how_to_use_datasets: 1. Small datasets (plate images, gram slides) → Direct use in CI/CD
2. Proteomics mzML → Full binary files stored separately; metadata in JSON
3. OD timeseries → Import into calibration pipeline; fit models
4. Generate domain-specific fixtures by following synthetic data generation patterns
extending_the_framework: Templates are fully parameterized → Adapt to new instruments/protocols
Datasets include ground truth + confidence → Retrain models with your data
All smoke tests follow common pattern → Extend with domain-specific checks
YAML allows inheritance and anchors → Reduce duplication for similar workflows

resource_statistics.next_phase_recommendation: Create GitHub Actions CI pipeline integrating all templates and datasets for automated validation on every commit
